text: nedarlanthaye landesi chithrapata kerehi thibena mahajana prasadaya, sammanaya handunwadi masa 18k thuladi wadi wu bawa kiyawe.landesi chithrapata narambaannan sankhyawa prathishathayak lesa gathwita 1999 di 5.5% kda,2000 di 5.9% k da,sammanaya handunwadun wasara 2001 di eya 9.5k dakwa wardhanaya wi atha.ee wagema 2002 wasaredi narambaannan prathishathaya 10.5% k [12] dakwa wardhanaya wi atha.

‘kalapa 5k athurin ma sewaya karana mid atlantik kalapaye rohal 28k pamana thibenawa.ma in ek rohalaka waidya adhyakshakawaraya lesa sewaya karanawa.owun warshikawa sama kalapayakama hondama rohal adhyakshakawaraya thoraganu labanawa.in mage kalapaya niyojanaya karamin jayagrahanaya kirimata ma hata hakiwuna.ma mita wasarakata pera wada bhara ganna wita mema rohala pawathune awasana rohal 10 athara.namuth ada wana wita palamu rohal 10 atharata paminimata apata hakiwela thibenawa.wasara kalayak thula rohala sampurnayenma wenas kirimata ma hata hakiwuna.
